ya10.2.1:385.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha paññindriyaṁ uppajjati.

ya10.2.1:537.1_0: Yassa vā pana paññindriyaṁ na uppajjati tassa upekkhindriyaṁ na uppajjatīti?
ya10.2.1:538.1_0: Ñāṇavippayuttānaṁ upekkhāya upapajjantānaṁ pavatte ñāṇavippayuttaupekkhāsampayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ paññindriyaṁ na uppajjati,
ya10.2.1:538.1_1: no ca tesaṁ upekkhindriyaṁ na uppajjati.
ya10.2.1:538.1_2: Sabbesaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ñāṇavippayuttaupekkhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṁ

ya10.2.1:540.1_1: no ca tesaṁ manindriyaṁ na uppajjati.

ya10.2.1:710.1_0: Na purisānaṁ upekkhāya upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha purisindriyaṁ na uppajjati,
ya10.2.1:710.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha upekkhindriyaṁ na uppajjati.
